Package jsx.dom.query

Provides an efficient DOM querying mechanism.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Path Defines paths that perform efficient queries over documents and elements.
Query A utility class supporting DOM query with its static methods.
Selector An abstract base class that defines selectors to select nodes when paths perform queries.
Selector.And Defines logical-AND selectors based on other selectors.
Selector.Any Defines selectors which select any nodes provided.
Selector.Even Defines selectors that only select the nodes that have even indices.
Selector.Not Defines logical-NOT selectors based on other selectors.
Selector.Nth Defines selectors that only select the nodes that have the specific indices.
Selector.Or Defines logical-OR selectors based on other selectors.
Selector.Tag Defines tag name selectors.
 

Package jsx.dom.query Description

Provides an efficient DOM querying mechanism.
